post.subject: Light Cone Event Warp: "Brilliant Fixation," "Bygone Reminiscence"
post.structured_content:
[{"insert":"
"},{"insert":{"image":"https://upload-os-bbs.hoyolab.com/upload/2024/07/29/4f96795e291999f63b4bcbfa26461f10_1825449104856312492.jpg"},"attributes":{"align":"img-center","height":1080,"width":1920,"size":"339058"}},{"insert":"
Hello, Trailblazers!
Light Cone Event Warp Period for this phase is from the end of the 2.4 version update to 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time) and includes the following content:

▌Light Cone Event Warp: "Brilliant Fixation""},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Dance at Sunset (Destruction)" and 4-star Light Cones "The Moles Welcome You (Destruction)," "Perfect Timing (Abundance)," and "The Birth of the Self (Erudition)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
After the Version 2.4 update – 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cone
Dance at Sunset (Destruction)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones
The Moles Welcome You (Destruction)
Perfect Timing (Abundance)
The Birth of the Self (Erudition)

▌Light Cone Event Warp: "Bygone Reminiscence""},{"insert":"
","attributes":{"header":4}},{"insert":"●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Night of Fright (Abundance)" and 4-star Light Cones "The Moles Welcome You (Destruction)," "Perfect Timing (Abundance)," and "The Birth of the Self (Erudition)" will be boosted.

■Event Period
After the Version 2.4 update – 2024/08/21 11:59:00 (server time)

■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cone
Night of Fright (Abundance)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones
The Moles Welcome You (Destruction)
Perfect Timing (Abundance)
The Birth of the Self (Erudition)

※ Among the above Light Cones, the limited Light Cone will not become available in the Stellar Warp event.
※ During the event, the limited 5-star Light Cone "Dance at Sunset (Destruction)" can only be obtained from the Light Cone Event Warp Brilliant Fixation, while the limited 5-star Light Cone "Night of Fright (Abundance)" can only be obtained from the Light Cone Event Warp Bygone Reminiscence.
※ This event is considered a Light Cone Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star Light Cone in any Light Cone Event Warp will always be carried over to other Light Cone Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
※ For more information, please head to the Warp screen.
"}]

user.introduce: May This Journey Lead Us Starward
